title: 1893 Sports Newspaper with numerous baseball articles
author: Archive

posts.post_title: 1893 Sports Newspaper with numerous baseball articles
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Keith
Up for sale I have a 1893 newspaper from Philadelphia called "Sporting Item".  It has numerous articles about baseball, boxing, crew, horse racing, and numerous other sports.  Only a small article on football - if there was more football content I'd be keeping it.  There are 4 pages (well actually 2 back and front)

Some of the focuses of the baseball articles are the St Louis Browns signing Caruthers, the possible retirement of Fred Pfeiffer and Walter Wilmont (the article states that Pfeiffer thinks there is more money in red eye than baseball and might take a job in the liquor industry - however according to a little research, i don't think either player retired until a few years later - they sound a little like brett favre to me), articles about Ward and Delehanty and much more.  There is also an interesting article which discusses the rising player salaries, and the fact that all of the ball teams lost money the previous season.
Overall a neat step back in time.

I am asking $100 plus shipping for the paper.
email me at kjjavic@aol.com

thanks
KJ
